sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react' import Navbar from '../components/Navbar'; import Sidebar from '../components/Sidebar'; import { Link } from 'react-scroll'; import { Link as Link2 } from 'react-router-dom'; import Skeleton from 'react-loading-skeleton'; const Home = () => { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false) const [skeleton, Setskeleton] = useState(false); const toggle = () => { setIsOpen(!isOpen); }; return ( <> {/* Hero section starts */}

Learn Today
Learn From Home

We make learning convenient and teaching easy

Take a Course
{/* Hero section Ends */} {/* About section starts */}

Fromhome Online Learning.

With our Learning Management Web application, we have made:

  • Learning easy by studying right from the comfort of your home or wherever.
  • Teaching more fun and monetary as tutors can upload there materials and millions of students can access them.
  • Learning in general fun.
{/* About section Ends */} {/* Count section starts */}
10

Students

20

Courses

50

Tutors

{/* Count section ends */} {/* Why us section starts */}

Learning Made Easy

With our Learning Management Application, we've made learning fun and interesting as well as teaching fun.

Learn More

Learning made easy

Your can learn with ease from the comfort of your home.

Teaching made fun

Reach out to more numbers of students by posting your courses on our platform and make money doing that.

{/* Why us section ends */} {/* Courses us section starts */}

Courses

Our Courses

Are you a Tutor?

Create a courses now and let students start taking it.

Create a Course
{/* CTA SECTION */}

) } export default Home
